title: The Benefit of Natural Immunity to Covid
itunes:title: The Benefit of Natural Immunity to Covid
description:
Dr. Ian Lustbader, Clinical Professor of Medicine at NYU Langone, explains why people who recovered from Covid appear to have a lower risk of contracting the delta variant than those who got the Pfizer shot. Matt Baker, Chief Strategy Officer at Dell, discusses earnings results and the "do-anything-from-anywhere" economy. Retired U.S. Army Major Dr. Sonja Stribling shares what she thinks it will take to get troops and civilians out of Afghanistan. And we Drive to the Close with Mark Travis, President and CEO at Intrepid Capital.

Hosts: Tim Stenovec and Kriti Gupta. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
